sOmOq yad-Bi#ndUqnAM BaqkShayE$t paSuqmAnth-syAqd-varu#Naq-stvE#naM gRuhNIyAqdyanna BaqkShayE#dapaqSuH syAqnnainaqM ~Mvaru#NO gRuhNIyA-dupaqspRuSya#mEqva pa#SuqmAn Ba#vatiq nainaqM ~Mvaru#NO gRuhNAtiq prati#yutOq varu#Nasyaq pASaq ityA#ha varuNapAqSAdEqva nirmu#cyaqtE &pra#tIkShaqmA ya#ntiq varu#NasyAqntar.hi#tyAq 
EdhO$&syEdhiShIqmahI-tyA#ha saqmidhaiqvAgniM na#maqsyanta# ( ) uqpAya#ntiq tEjO#&siq tEjOq mayi# dhEqhItyA#haq tEja# EqvA&&tman dha#ttE || 13
(rakShA(gm)#si - prayAqjA - nRuqtavOq - vai - na#maqsyantOq - dvAda#Sa ca) (A3)
